name: A Greasyfork Darkly
description: Dark styles for Greasyfork.org. Also widen the middle part a bit. More themes in Customize button.
additional_info:
2018-08-29: Fix code diff colors. Added ArcDark & Dracula themes.
2018-06-13: Fix white background when logging in.
2018-06-11: Fixed white background when flagging posts.
2018-03-04: Fixed forum posts that are marked as read.
2018-03-01: Fixed code blocks in forums, tables in forums, quotes in forums, and site nav "More" popup, "Active" border colors.
2018-02-27: Fixed line number coloring. Updated themes & added TomorrowNight theme.

discussions.name: Why do you hide line numbers?
Text not readable when rating a script
